content: / 4 5 mm needles round 1 k1tbl p1 to end separate body & sleeves repeat round 1 until cuff measures 2 5 / 6 5 cm maintain rib at front as set and rm as you come to them work across left front sts place the 45 48 49 54 59 61 67 bobble in patt 72 78 left sleeve sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 4 4 4 4 4 6 6 6 6 sts using the backwards loop method finishing k across back sts to next m place the 45 48 49 54 59 61 67 72 78 right sleeve sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 4 4 4 4 4 6 6 6 6 sts work to end maintaining use a crochet slip_stitch chain see special techniques on ribbing at the front sts 178 190 206 220 238 254 272 ws of sweater at base of collar ribbing to stabilize the 288 306 sts neckline begin and end the crochet chain just inside the ribbing panels on the left and right of cardigan fronts body weave in ends and close small gaps at underarm steam or wet block to finished measurements being careful not to maintaining rib at fronts as set work in st st until body stretch neck rib measures 5 5 6 6 6 5 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 / 14 15 15 16 5 16 5 18 19 20 21 5 cm from underarm or until desired length note the hem rib will add 3 / 7 5 cm to the length hem rib change to us 7 / 4 5 mm needles round 1 k1tbl p1 to end repeat round 1 until hem rib measures 3 / 7 5 cm bobble in patt sleeves place 45 48 49 54 59 61 67 72 78 sleeve sts on us 9 / 5 5 mm circular needles pick up and k 3 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 sts from underarm pm to indicate bor pick up and k 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 more sts from the underarm join for working in the round 50 53 54 59 64 68 74 79 85 sts work in st st for 6 6 6 6 6 4 4 4 4 rnds decrease round k1 k2tog k until 3 sts remain ssk k1 2 sts decrease d repeat decrease round every 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 5 4 rnds 2 3 3 4 4 4 4 5 7 more times 44 45 46 49 54 58 64 67 69 sts continue in st st until the sleeve measures 6 5 / 16 5 cm from underarm if you would like longer sleeves add length here remembering that this may add to yardage requirements note the ribbing will add 2 5 / 6 5 cm to the sleeve length © sonder yarn co 2024 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal
